thread.title: BRIEF-Trillium Asset Management Urges Facebook Shareholders To Vote For Risk Oversight Committee Proposal

title: BRIEF-Trillium Asset Management Urges Facebook Shareholders To Vote For Risk Oversight Committee Proposal

organizations.name: brief-trillium asset management urges facebook shareholders to vote for risk oversight committee
risk oversight committee proposal reuters staff

text:
April 17, 2018 / 5:52 PM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-Trillium Asset Management Urges Facebook Shareholders To Vote For Risk Oversight Committee Proposal Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 17 (Reuters) - Trillium Asset Management: 
* TRILLIUM ASSET MANAGEMENT URGES FACEBOOK SHAREHOLDERS TO VOTE IN FAVOR OF PROPOSAL REGARDING RISK OVERSIGHT COMMITTEE - SEC FILING Source text - ( bit.ly/2HtGKZz )
